config.quiz_craft.pingNumEach.descriptio: The num of pings save for each player (work only in client side)
config.quiz_craft.includeFluids.descript: Whether you can ping on the fluid
config.quiz_craft.infoColor.description: Info shown when looking at the ping point, format: 0xAARRGGBB
config.quiz_craft.secondsToVanish.descri:
How long does it take for the ping point to disappear.
0 means never, only work at your client side
config.quiz_craft.highlightColor.descrip: Color of the highlight block, format: 0xAARRGGBB
config.quiz_craft.soundIndex.description:
The index of the ping sound:
0: ping location
1: ping enemy
2: ping item
3: mozambique lifeline
4: block anvil break
